text:
Hello,

I have a table in the HubDB with a list of products.
The listing works very well and under the three languages, in this table I have labels in French, English, German to manage the translations.

In my code template, I can locate the language via the url and display the right fields for single product pages.
However I have an SEO problem with the <link rel="alternate"> specifying the wrong href. Obviously HubSpot doesn't understand that we have multiple languages for these pages and doesn't include the correct urls.

Do you have a solution for this?

Thanks a lot :slightly_smiling_face:
